com.hdcookbook.grin.test.bigjdk
Class GrinView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  com.hdcookbook.grin.test.bigjdk.GenericMain
                      com.hdcookbook.grin.test.bigjdk.GrinView
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnimationContext, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GrinView
extends GenericMain

This is like GenericMain, and also includes a GUI to browse the Show file and control show execution. The GUI is equivalent to the command line interface provided by GenericMain.

Author:
Bill Foote (http://jovial.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form
